title: Hephaisteion
description: The temple of Hephaistos located on the northwest side of the Agora of Athens.

properties.description: Representative point location of the Temple of Hephaistos, which is located on the northwest side of the Agora of Athens. Coordinates derived from analysis of Google Earth imagery.
properties.title: Imagery Location of the Hephaisteion

properties.description: Representative point location of the Hephaisteion in the Agora of Athens. Coordinates gathered on 8 July 2013 with a Sony DSC-HX200V GPS.
properties.title: GPS Location of the Hephaisteion
